data.actual_result: Emote gets shifted to the top left corner when by itself
data.expected_result: Emote is placed correctly in both notifications
data.short_description: Standalone emotes in in-app notifications get shifted to the top left corner
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone send you a DM that contains only an emote - Observe the position of the emote in the in-app notification - Have the person then send you a DM that contains an emote followed by text - Observe the postion of the emote in the second notification
